title: Make animated graph canvas background fully transparent

requirements.text: Update the animated background canvas so it renders with a fully transparent background (no black fill), allowing the app’s white background to show through while keeping only the neon nodes/lines visible.
acceptanceCriteria: On all routes, the area behind the animated graph shows the app background color (white) rather than black.
The canvas element has no CSS background color applied (computed background is transparent).
The render loop does not paint an opaque background (no black or other solid fill per frame); only the graph edges/nodes are drawn.
No visual ‘black flash’ appears on initial load or on resize before the first animation frame completes.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not modify any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the graph’s node/edge colors, shapes, or animation behavior beyond what is necessary to make the canvas background transparent.
